Title: The Spoil
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Dave Andron (teleplay), Elmore Leonard (story), Dave Andron (story), Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole"), Benjamin Cavell (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan is assigned to protect a local coal mine executive as she tries to buy up land for the company but faces opposition from the Bennett clan.
